title: Updated Countertops*, Clubhouse, Billiards/shuffle board, Elevators
posting_body: ['ASK ABOUT OUR CURRENT SPECIAL OFFERS!', 'Welcome to Portola at SouthGlenn', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 1', 'OR Text', '1', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1114 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Convenient living is yours when you rent at The Portola at Southglenn Apartments in Centennial, Colorado.', 'Situated above cafes, restaurants and designer boutiques, The Portola at Southglenn is a community of studio, one, two and three-bedroom apartment homes with newly renovated features and beautiful Mountain and Downtown views.', 'Our floorplans come in 3 unique interiors styles with renovated units featuring upgraded cabinetry, fixtures, countertops, farmhouse sinks and new wood-style flooring.', 'Features:', 'Light fixtures upgrades*, Oversized Tubs*, Internet Access, Updated Cabinetry*, Fridge with Dual Ice & Water Dispenser*, Washer & Dryer*, Refaced Cabinets/Cherry*, Brushed Nickel Fixtures*, Mountain Views*, Balcony*, Farmhouse-style Sink*, Updated Countertops*, Solar Window Shades*', '*In Select Units', 'Community Amenities:', 'Outdoor Fire Pit, Heated Swimming Pool, Onsite Recycling, Storage Areas, Fitness Center, WiFi in Common Areas, Clubhouse, Spa, Close, Dry Cleaner Service, Located at the Streets of Southglenn, Gated Community, Package Lockers, Billiards/shuffle board, High-end Spin Bikes, Garage Parking, Community Amenities Image, Elevators, Hot Tub', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats and Dogs Allowed.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'MsWASb9j']
